text: @AyannaPressley America wake up. Ask the idiot Electoral College voters that elected the liar & corrupt; the shameless McConnell lead GOP senators that acquitted without trial the maniac. I hope covid19 karma is coming for them. Lets VOTE them OUT this November 2020 and protect America.
